frame.name: Stinginess
frame.definition:
<def-root>In this frame, a <fen>Resource_controller</fen> is judged by a <fen>Judge</fen> (who is usually implicit) according to how freely they allow the <fen>Recipient</fen> access to their <fen>Resource</fen>. The <fen>Resource_controller</fen> may exhibit this attitude with an <fen>Expressor</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Resource_controller">John</fex> is <t>mean</t> <fex name="Resource">with money</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Resource_controller">Sally</fex> has always been <t>generous</t> <fex name="Recipient">to her children</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Resource_controller
FE.definition: <def-root>The Resource_Controller is the individual who controls access to the Resource. <ex><fex name="Resource_controller">Stampy</fex> was <t>stingy</t> with his peanuts.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Resource
FE.definition: <def-root>The Resource_controller controls the Recipient's access to the Resource. <ex>Surprising, Dad was <t>stingy</t> <fex name="Resource">with his inheritance</fex>.</ex> <ex>Dragons often <t>hoard</t> <fex name="Resource">gold</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Recipient
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Recipient</fen> is the individual or individuals who receive or should receive the <fen>Resource</fen> from the <fen>Resource_controller</fen>. <ex>Mr. Burns is extremely <t>miserly</t> <fex name="Recipient">towards his employees</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Degree</fen> is how generous or stingy the <fen>Resource_controller</fen> is judged to be. <ex>John is <fex name="Degree">very</fex> <t>generous</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Behavior
FE.definition: <def-root>The Behavior is an action of the Resource_controller which is judged to be generous or stingy. <ex>It was <t>generous</t> of Jim <fex name="Behavior">to have us over for dinner</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Behavior">Jim's dinner invitation</fex> was very <t>generous</t>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Judge
FE.definition:
<def-root>The individual whose point of view is taken in assigning the judgment denoted by the target.
</def-root>

FE.name: Expressor
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Expressor</fen> is the body part or action by a body part which indicates the character of the <fen>Resource_controller</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>A characterization of the way in which the <fen>Resource_controller</fen> exhibits stinginess.
<ex>She was always <fex name="Manner">sensitively</fex> <t>generous</t> to me.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: generous.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: freely giving more of something, especially money, than is strictly necessary or expected.

lexUnit.name: mean.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: unwilling to give or share money.

lexUnit.name: lavish.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: giving or given in profusion.

lexUnit.name: lavish.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: bestow or cover in generous or extravagant quantities.

lexUnit.name: miserliness.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the quality characteristic of a miser; the state of being a miser

lexUnit.name: miser.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a person who hoards wealth and spends very little.

lexUnit.name: hoard.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: be reluctant to use or give away.

lexUnit.name: miserly.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: of or characteristic of a miser.

lexUnit.name: niggardliness.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the quality or state of being niggardly
